mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST(U_UID, U_CODE, U_USERNAME, U_PASSWORD, U_SALT, U_SECRET, U_APP_ID, U_APP_CHANNEL, U_APP_VERSION, U_ONLINE, U_STATUS) VALUES(#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{username},#{password},#{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{appChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{appVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{online},'1')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST WHERE U_ID = #{id} AND U_USERNAME != 'admin'
DELETE FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION WHERE U_ID = #{id} AND R_KEY != 'admin'

DELETE FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST WHERE U_USERNAME != 'admin' AND U_ID IN
#{item}

DELETE FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION WHERE U_USERNAME != 'admin' AND U_ID IN
#{item}
mapper.update: update SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION set R_ID = #{roleId} WHERE U_ID = #{id} AND R_KEY != 'admin'
mapper.select: SELECT count(t.U_ID) FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION t WHERE t.R_ID = #{roleId} AND t.U_ID = #{userId}

SELECT t.U_ID, t.U_UID, t.U_CODE, t.U_USERNAME, '******' AS U_PASSWORD, '******' AS U_SALT, '******' AS U_SECRET, t.U_APP_ID, t.U_APP_CHANNEL, t.U_APP_VERSION, t.U_ONLINE, t.U_LATEST_ONLINE, t.U_STATUS, t.U_TIME24 FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST t WHERE t.U_ID = #{id}

SELECT t.U_ID, t.U_UID, t.U_CODE, t.U_USERNAME, '******' AS U_PASSWORD, '******' AS U_SALT, '******' AS U_SECRET, t.U_APP_ID, t.U_APP_CHANNEL, t.U_APP_VERSION, t.U_ONLINE, t.U_LATEST_ONLINE, t.U_STATUS, t.U_TIME24 FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST t LEFT JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION y ON y.U_ID = t.U_ID WHERE t.U_ID = #{id}

SELECT t.U_ID, t.U_UID, t.U_CODE, t.U_USERNAME, '******' AS U_PASSWORD, '******' AS U_SALT, '******' AS U_SECRET, t.U_APP_ID, t.U_APP_CHANNEL, t.U_APP_VERSION, t.U_ONLINE, t.U_LATEST_ONLINE, t.U_STATUS, t.U_TIME24 FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST t INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x ON t.U_ID = x.U_ID WHERE t.U_STATUS = 1

SELECT t.U_ID, t.U_UID, t.U_CODE, t.U_USERNAME, '******' AS U_PASSWORD, '******' AS U_SALT, '******' AS U_SECRET, t.U_APP_ID, t.U_APP_CHANNEL, t.U_APP_VERSION, t.U_ONLINE, t.U_LATEST_ONLINE, t.U_STATUS, t.U_TIME24 FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_LIST t LEFT JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION y ON y.U_ID = t.U_ID WHERE t.U_USERNAME != 'admin'
and EXISTS (SELECT y.U_ID FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION y WHERE y.U_ID = t.U_ID AND y.R_ID = #{model.roleId} )
and t.U_STATUS = #{model.status}
and t.U_USERNAME like CONCAT('%',#{model.username},'%')
SELECT t.R_ID FROM SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_LIST t INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x ON t.R_ID = x.R_ID WHERE t.R_STATUS = '1' AND x.U_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY x.R_PRTY DESC
SELECT t.R_ID, t.R_NAME FROM SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_LIST t INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x ON t.R_ID = x.R_ID WHERE t.R_STATUS = '1' AND x.U_ID = #{uid} ORDER BY t.R_NAME ASC

SELECT t.R_ID, t.R_KEY, t.R_NAME, t.R_TYPE, t.R_INTRO, t.R_STATUS, t.R_TIME24 FROM SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_LIST t INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x ON t.R_ID = x.R_ID WHERE t.R_STATUS = 1 AND x.U_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY x.R_PRTY ASC

SELECT DISTINCT y.PERMS FROM SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_LIST t INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_USER_ROLE_RELATION x ON t.R_ID = x.R_ID INNER JOIN SYS_AUTHZ_ROLE_PERMS y ON t.R_ID = y.R_ID WHERE x.U_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY x.R_PRTY ASC

SELECT t.U_PID, t.U_ID, t.U_NICKNAME, t.U_AVATAR, t.U_COUNTRY_CODE, t.U_PHONE, t.U_EMAIL, t.U_GENDER, t.U_BIRTHDAY, t.U_IDCARD, t.U_AGE, t.U_HEIGHT, t.U_WEIGHT, t.U_LANGUAGE, t.U_INTRO, t.U_PHOTOS, t.U_PROVINCE, t.U_CITY, t.U_AREA, t.U_WGS84_LNG, t.U_WGS84_LAT, t.U_DEGREE, t.U_TIME24 FROM SYS_AUTHZ_USER_PROFILE t WHERE t.U_ID = #{uid}
